Summary: watching tv in home, saw bullet like object go across sky, green and blue lights then dissapeared as quickly as it started.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Telford
There were no other sightings in Telford on or around April 12th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswatching tv. noticed out of corner of eye, thought it was a plane. Traveling way too fast to be a plane and disapeared as quickly as it was over. After seeing it I was in a state of shock and panic. Scared out of my mind.
